articles.title: Oklahoma hotel says Missouri State baseball players broke into rooms for gross pictures - News-Leader
articles.description: It's safe to say Missouri State won't be staying in a certain hotel in Stillwater, Oklahoma, anytime soon after the NCAA baseball tournament.
